channel.title: I have a question which may seem dumb lol
channel.description:
Erm right never done this before but how do i put say like someone types ::membership and they get membership and in moreinfo/members.txt how do i put so it saves it automaticly
[i]This question doesnt matter if you dont know it ;) just badly want to know how to save the members.txt when someone types ::membership[/i] and if an admin takes away there membership it gets rid of there name?
Thanks Much appreciated if someone could tell me this xD never done this again once again.

item.title: I have a question which may seem dumb lol
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

No actually use use this one added the { :

if(command.startsWith("membership") { playerIsMember = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has given himself member; BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+name+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); }

Forgot to add it

item.title: I have a question which may seem dumb lol
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“warlok, post:2, topic:198184”]If.commandequalsignorecase("membership"); player-ismember = 1; SendMessage("you are now a memeber"); }[/quote]

Change your code to

if(command.startsWith(“memberplease”)
playerIsMember = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has given himself member;
BufferedWriter bw = null;
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“data/members.txt”, true));
bw.write(""+name+"");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
}

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question which may seem dumb lol
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Try this:

else if(command.startsWith("givemember") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Armo") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Daw of death")))) { String name = command.substring(11); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerIsMember = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = name+" has been given Membership by "+playerName; BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+name+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Change the armo to your username

Read full topic
